titleStmt.title: Mr. Geo. Withers revived, or, His prophesie of our present calamity, and (except we repent) future misery written by him in the year 1628.
titleStmt.author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
An extract from the author's Britains remembrancer, 1628.
